entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the management and maintenance of Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs). The person expresses a preference for archiving the current BIPs repository, suggesting that it might be more beneficial if individuals maintained separate repositories for BIPs. Despite this preference, there's an acknowledgment of the continuing relevance of the existing setup. A significant point of contention arises with the suggestion regarding the roles of mailing list moderators and BIP editors. The individual explicitly disagrees with the idea of having the same people serve both as mailing list moderators and BIP editors, particularly objecting to two suggested names for these positions. This stance underscores a concern for the separation of duties and perhaps hints at broader issues of governance and oversight within the Bitcoin development community.
